00021 #ifndef _MMDATFileWriter_HEADER_
00022 #define _MMDATFileWriter_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file MMDATFileWriter.h This file defines a class that writes a DAT file.  The pixel DataSet data
00025  *      is written to the file using Windows memory-mapping.
00026  */
00027 
00028 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DATData.h"
00029 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/DATFileWriter.h"
00030 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/GenericFileWriter.h"
00031 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/MMDataSetDataWriter.h"
00032 //
00033 #include <fstream>
00034 //
00035 
00036 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00037 #pragma warning(disable: 4290) // don't show warnings about throw keyword on function declarations.
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00041 {
00042 
00043 /*! This class writes a DAT file.  The pixel DataSet data is written using Windows memory-mapping */
00044 class MMDATFileWriter : public DATFileWriter
00045 {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049         /*! Constructor
00050          *  Creates the DAT file and writes header sections of the file.
00051          *      @param p The DATData object to write to the file.
00052          */
00053         MMDATFileWriter(DATData &p);
00054         /*! Destructor */
00055         ~MMDATFileWriter();
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00059         /*! Opens the writer.
00060          *      This opens the file and a memory-mapped view of the pixel DataSet.
00061          *      It closes a previously opened file.
00062          *      @return true if it succeeded.  Method may also throw exceptions.
00063          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileCreateException
00064          */
00065         bool Open();
00066 
00067         /*! Closes the writer.
00068          *      This writes the pixel data to the file in network order and closes the file.
00069          *  Once the writer is closed it should not be used to open and read the pixel data, overwritting existing pixel
00070          *      data is OK.
00071          *      @return true if it succeeded.  Method may also throw exceptions.
00072          */
00073         bool Close();
00074 
00075 public:
00076         /*! Maps the pixel data for access starting at firstRow and continuing for rowsToMap.
00077          *  The number of pixels mapped is the number of row mapped times the number of pixels per row (DATData::GetCols).
00078          *      @param firstRow First row of the DAT image to map for access.
00079          *      @param rowsToMap Requested number of DAT image rows to map.  Use GetRowsMapped for number of rows actually mapped.
00080          */
00081         void MapPixelData(int32_t firstRow, int32_t rowsToMap);
00082         /*! Get a pointer to the pixel data that has been mapped for access.
00083          *      @return Pointer to the mapped data.
00084          */
00085         u_int16_t* GetMappedPixelDataPtr();
00086         /*! Get the first DAT image row that has been mapped.
00087          *      @return Index of the first DAT image row mapped for access.
00088          */
00089         int32_t GetFirstPixelRowMapped();
00090         /*! Get the number of DAT image rows that have been mapped.
00091          *  The number of pixels mapped is the number of row mapped times the number of pixels per row (DATData::GetCols).
00092          *      @return The number of DAT image rows mapped for access.
00093          */
00094         int32_t GetPixelRowsMapped();
00095         /*! Get the suggested maximum number of DAT image rows to map.
00096          *      @return The suggested maximum number of DAT image rows to map
00097          */
00098         int32_t GetMaxPixelRowsToMap();
00099 
00100 private:
00101         virtual void WritePixels(const Uint16Vector &v) {}      // hide this method
00102 
00103         /*! Writes the pixel DataSet data in network byte order.
00104          * Once this method is called this writer should not be used
00105          * to read the pixel DataSet data.
00106          */
00107         void HTONPixelDataSet();
00108 
00109 private:
00110         /*! Memory-mapped DataSet data writer */
00111         MMDataSetDataWriter* pixelWriter;
00112 
00113         /*! DAT file name */
00114         std::string filename;
00115 
00116         /*! Pointer to the pixel DataSetHeader */
00117         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader* dataSetHdr;
00118 
00119         /*! Number of rows of pixels in the DAT image */
00120         int32_t rows;
00121 
00122         /*! Number of columns of pixels in the DAT image */
00123         int32_t cols;
00124 };
00125 
00126 }
00127 
00128 #endif // _MMDATFileWriter_HEADER_
